title: Choosing roles
body: Recently I tried to play a ranked and I asked for mid and jungle the champion select started and i got ADC does anyone know why this always happens to me?

replies.body: Unless ADC was accidently selected, it sounds like you were Auto-filled.  This can happen if a there is a low amount of a specific role in queue.  Getting autofilled should guarantee one of your preferred role in the next game, per our [ranked play faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h6q1).  I hope that helps!
